projects.name: Mock-2-HTML
projects.description: A webapp for converting mockups to HTML code. It utilizes OpenAI API Computer vision to analyse png mockup images and generates the HTML code that represents the UI in the mockup image.

projects.name: Zen and Wellness CBD
projects.description: This website services a CBD / Kratom dispensary and has interesting ecommerce features that are integrated directely into an AI CBD expert system meant to help the user in choosing the correct products to purchase.

projects.name: LLAMA CHAT
projects.description: A chat app built on top of websocket technology. It mimics a Discord style chat room.

projects.name: BOM Generator
projects.description: Uses Revit API for interoperability with Autodesk Revit. Generates Bill of Materials from the 3D CAD models that Revit produces

projects.name: Marathon Training Videos
projects.description: A website for training marathon field workers in construction safety

projects.name: Bluebeam BOM Generator
projects.description: Generates a Bill of Materials for In Wall devices and Fire Alarm Systems using PDF's generated by Bluebeam
